prod_short_desc: Join StarScavenger on dangerous salvage missions!
prod_long_desc:
Join the Freemakers: Rowan, Kordi and Zander as they travel the stars in search of space junk. With modular wings, engines and blasters, StarScavenger can be rebuilt into various configurations, and features a foldout top section that reveals a mini scavenger vessel with salvage scoop with space for a minifigure and R0-GR (Roger), the siblings’ friendly Droid. This set includes 3 minifigures plus a Droid.
Build the Freemakers’ starship and join them as they scour the galaxy for space junk
Featured in the LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures TV show
Includes Rowan, Kordi, Zander and R0-GR
LEGO Star Wars building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The starship with wings closed is over 3” high, 8” long and 8” wide. The starship with wings open is over 1” high, 8” long and 9” wide
558 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
